channel.title: Black Mesa Steam stuck in Fullbright
channel.description:
Hi everyone! How you will see in the title. The Black Mesa Steam release stuck the Fullbright to 1. I do not know what to do. But the weird thing is that when I create a map, have the mat_fullbright to 0. I have an screenshot showing mat_fullbright 1 in singleplayer maps and my map in mat_fullbright 0.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/OTXzf9Z.jpg?1[/img]
This is my map called Testing, tested in Multiplayer & Singleplayer. mat_fullbright is off. 8o
[img]https://i.imgur.com/8g3Lm2p.jpg?1[/img]
This map is the singleplayer mode. The mat_fullbright is on and does not turn off with the command. ||
How you can see in the screenshots. The mat_fullbright only appears on the maps created by the developers. This is very weird. Any fix? :S
A big hello to developers who created this mod so impressive. :slight_smile:

item.title: Black Mesa Steam stuck in Fullbright
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
I was able to eliminate this problem by disabling the “Windows Aero Extensions” in the advanced graphics options.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Steam stuck in Fullbright

item.title: Black Mesa Steam stuck in Fullbright
item.dc:creator: MatiasKiller21
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:
MatiasKiller21:
TextFAMGUY1:

Your graphics options look extremely low end. Are you running on an integrated graphics chip or do you have a graphics card?

I am using integrated graphics chip!

Then it is possible that the integrated graphics chip does not support HDR, in which case you may be out of luck. Can you find out what DirectX version it runs?

I have games with HDR & works perfectly! That is my integrated graphics chip info.

ShaderAPI: shaderapidx9.dll
Shader API Driver Info:

Driver : igdumdx32.dll Version : 1970384967174220
Driver Description : Intel® Graphics Media Accelerator 3150
Chipset version 32902 40961 577179673 2

Display mode : 1024 x 768 (BGRX8888)
Vertex Shader Version : 3.0 Pixel Shader Version : 2.0

Device Caps :

HWTRANSFORMANDLIGHT N NPATCHES N PUREDEVICE N

TEXTUREVIDEOMEMORY Y TLVERTEXSYSTEMMEMORY Y TLVERTEXVIDEOMEMORY N

Max Texture Dimensions : 2048 x 2048

device id: 0xa001

item.title: Black Mesa Steam stuck in Fullbright
item.dc:creator: MatiasKiller21
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

Our maps were not compiled with LDR, which is why they are fullbright for you.

You can find the fix here.

I’ve compiled my map with HDR and have lights yet. The fix does not work

Read full topic
